articles.author: Lucinda Shen
articles.title: Stock scammers are using the coronavirus outbreak to dupe investors, SEC warns
articles.description: Waving promises of a coronavirus cure, stock market scammers are seeking to make a quick buck.

articles.author: Jeremy Kahn
articles.title: Startup uses A.I. to identify molecules that could fight coronavirus
articles.description: Insilico Medicine uses deepfake-like system to discover thousands of potential drug candidates in four days

articles.author: Ian Mount
articles.title: These countries have imposed China travel restrictions over the coronavirus
articles.description: Tighter travel restrictions including quarantines are spreading as worldwide efforts to contain the coronavirus accelerate.

articles.author: Ian Mount
articles.title: Hong Kong has a coronavirus face mask shortage. Now rumors have sparked toilet paper panic buying
articles.description: Toilet paper was unavailable in supermarkets in parts of the city as posts circulated on social media showing empty shelves and shoppers lining up to snag rolls.

articles.author: eamonbarrett
articles.title: UN cancels biodiversity meeting in China over coronavirus fears
articles.description: The preparatory meeting for the Convention on Biological Diversity has moved from Yunnan to Rome while China grapples with the novel coronavirus

articles.author: Grady McGregor
articles.title: Coronavirus, bird flu, swine fever: Why China is still so susceptible to disease outbreaks
articles.description: The nation's outdated food supply leaves it especially vulnerable to diseases like coronavirus, swine fever, and bird flu.
